content: of center front gap 97 105 119 133 149 163 back sts work 0 0 2 2 1 0 round s as set then repeat the decrease round 0 0 12 15 20 0 times 74 80 80 84 88 88 sts join shoulders place 31 34 40 47 54 60 shoulder sts at each end of work 3 3 3 2 2 1 round s even ending after working a back on empty ndl then place 35 37 39 39 41 43 round 24 24 20 16 12 12 center back sts on holder turn work inside out hold right sides of work facing each other using mc working from break cc and knit 1 round with mc armhole edge inward to the neck join shoulder sts using the 3 needle bobble method turn work rs out cuff change to smaller dpns and work remainder of sleeve in cut steeks mc using a sewing machine and a 2 mm stitch length carefully sew two parallel lines of sts on each side of the centerline of next round k1 k2tog 8 14 14 13 11 10 times k2tog all three steeks sewing within the steek and not in the front k1 13 7 7 11 15 15 times k2tog 9 15 15 12 10 11 or back areas with a small sharp scissors cut open each times 44 44 44 48 52 52 sts steek along its centerline work in k2 p2 ribbing for 2 25 5 5 cm sleeves place 15 15 17 19 19 21 held underarm sts on larger bobble all sts loosely in patt ndl with rs facing sl the first 7 7 8 9 9 10 sts pwise pm for eor join mc and cc1 near center of underarm finishing soak in cool water and wool wash block to measurements in the next round the live sts and picked up sts are worked according and lay flat to dry to the patt from round 1 of triangle chart neckband next round set-up work 8 8 9 10 10 11 live sts using mc and smaller ndl with rs facing and beg at left in patt p/u and k 40 44 47 50 58 61 sts in patt from shoulder join p/u and k 17 sts along left front neck underarm to shoulder join 1 st at top of shoulder and k23 25 27 27 29 31 held center front sts p/u and k 17 40 44 47 50 58 61 sts in patt from shoulder join to sts along right front neck k 35 37 39 39 41 43 held back underarm then work 7 7 8 9 9 10 live sts in patt to end neck sts 92 96 100 100 104 108 sts 96 104 112 120 136 144 sts work in k2 p2 ribbing for 2 25 5 5 cm work even in patt until 52 48 40 32 32 28 rnds have been completed ending after working a round
